description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including layout, button styles, game board, and responsive design.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Container for the game, providing layout and margin constraints.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Displays the current status of the game with specific styling for visibility.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Styling for the game's grid layout, defining columns and gaps.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styling for each square in the game board, including background, borders, and hover effects.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Container for the game's control elements, allowing for flexible display of buttons.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Base styling for buttons used throughout the application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the App component, including text alignment and background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header section of the application, ensuring it is centered and laid out properly.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes, styled for visibility and user interaction.
